testcase.name: TC17 Reusuble Methots ile window handle
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "WebUniversityUrl" sayfasina gider..........................passed And Login Porta' a kadar asagi iner.........................................passed And Login Portala tiklar....................................................passed And Diger window'a gecin....................................................passed Then "Bilal" ve "SAFAK" kutularina deger yazar..............................passed And WebUniversity Login butonuna basar......................................passed And Popup'ta cikan yazinin "validation failed" oldugunu test edin...........passed Then Ok diyerek Popup'i kapatin.............................................passed And Ilk sayfaya geri donun..................................................passed And Ilk sayfaya donuldugunu test edin.......................................passed Then biraz 3 saniye bekle...................................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
